pkgmetadata.longdescription: Co-Clustering with Document-Term Matrix // Functions for co- clustering with C code illustrating two diagonal approaches, (Ailem Role Nadif, 2016, doi:10.1016/j.knosys.2016.07.002), (Laclau Nadif, 2016, doi:10.1016/j.neucom.2016.02.003). A relevant initialization and a suitable setting of the parameters are required. For a dimensionality reduction via random projection, a function is included.
